column4: Hi, am locked out of ubuntu - can login as root in rescue mode & from there can make / edit / delete users & passwords ( none of which work in `production mode')   but thats it -  can anyone pls help suggest something?
nope - done that even changed root's passwd - which was not accepted in either real or rescue mode
you can also use the same command to set the password for your regular user.. passwd <username> should work
vlc server? didn't know they had one of those
